name: Cyber Man
overview: You are Cyber Man, a familiar pellet-eating entity. You travel through a 3D maze in first person view, avoiding your rivals who seek to send you back to the beginning of the maze. Collect the pellets and avoid the monsters. You can hear them coming and see them in the HUD. Once you've gotten the pellets, you can flee the maze. Or does that just lead to a new maze?
